attributes.action: Change the National Anthem to We Like To Party (The Vengabus)
attributes.additional_details: During a national crisis what would motivate the people of Great Britain more than getting up and belting this absolute tune, hand on heart in front of the Union Jack. This master stroke of music should get what it truly deserves
attributes.background: I would like the National Anthem changed from God Save The Queen to We Like To Party (The Vengabus) by the Vengaboys

rejection.details:
The use of the present National Anthem is a matter of tradition rather than having any legal or constitutional status.

You can find more information about the history and status of the national anthem here:https://www.royal.uk/national-anthem
